summary: In order to avoid reprisals from the Wehrmacht for the murder of a soldier, intellectuals from a Romanian village try to convince Ipu, the village idiot, to take the blame for the murder and save everybody.
cast: Amza Pellea|Cristian Sofron|Ion Besoiu|Gheorghe Dinica|Ioana Bulca|Octavian Cotescu|Iurie Darie|Klára Sebök|Stefan Mihailescu-Braila|Eugenia Bosânceanu|Eliza Petrachescu|Sergiu Nicolaescu|Alexandru Herescu|Ernest Maftei|Lazar Vrabie
title: Atunci i-am condamnat pe toti la moarte
